property.name: target.aws.access.id
property.description: Account id for AWs operations. Confidential

property.name: target.aws.access.key
property.description: Account key for AWs operations. Confidential.

property.name: target.aws.instance.type
property.description: Instance type to use in dev cluster.

property.name: target.aws.user
property.description: The user to use to ssh into the dev cluster. This is determined by the base Ubuntu image(s) specified in base.image.id.

property.name: target.aws.region
property.description: Region to launch dev cluster in.

property.name: target.aws.subnet
property.description: Subnet to spawn dev cluster in.

property.name: target.aws.security.group
property.description: Security group for dev cluster, which allows inbound only from your organization's IP's.

property.name: target.aws.key.pair
property.description: Keypair name (determines key to use for ssh into dev cluster, see below).

property.name: target.aws.key.file
property.description: Location of private key (of the key.pair) to use with dev cluster instances.

property.name: target.aws.base.image.id
property.description: Public Ubuntu 14.04 public image of eu-west data center.

property.name: s3.bucket.prefix
property.description: This is for naming buckets created by this tool. Important, make this unique to your org or team, as bucket names are global.
